name: LPS Shop Fast Degreaser, Removes Grease, Oil & Grime, Fast-Acting Solvent for Degreasing Parts and Equipments, Evaporates Quickly, No Rinse Necessary
short_description: Rapid, Powerful Degreasing: Instantly dissolves tough grease, oil, and grime, making cleaning quick and effortless on machinery, gears, bearings, and more.
No-Rinse, Quick Evaporation: The fast-evaporating industrial-strength formula leaves surfaces clean, dry, and residue-free—no rinsing or wiping required.
Versatile Professional Cleaner: Ideal for forklifts, cables, chains, hand tools, tire rims, pulleys, trailer hitches, and virtually any metal equipment needing reliable degreasing.
Precision Smart Lock Sprayer: Features a Flip Straw nozzle providing targeted accuracy for detailed cleaning or wide spray coverage for larger surfaces.
Secure Anti-Slip Grip: Ergonomically designed aerosol can ensures a safe, comfortable grip, even when handling with greasy or slippery hands, enhancing ease and precision of application.
product_description: Make tough cleaning tasks effortless with LPS Shop Fast Degreaser, the ultimate professional-grade solution for instantly dissolving grease, grime, oil, and stubborn contaminants. Engineered with an industrial-strength, fast-acting solvent formula, this powerful degreaser quickly penetrates and removes buildup from equipment and parts, including bearings, cables, chains, gears, pulleys, forklifts, tire rims, trailer hitches, hand tools, and various machinery. Its fast evaporation technology means no rinsing or wiping is required, leaving surfaces impeccably clean, completely dry, and residue-free in seconds—significantly reducing your maintenance time. Designed for versatility and convenience, the innovative Smart Lock Sprayer provides precision cleaning control, with a Flip Straw nozzle offering either a targeted stream for detailed degreasing or a broad spray for larger areas. The ergonomic aerosol can features an anti-slip grip, ensuring secure handling even in slippery, greasy conditions. Whether you're maintaining heavy industrial equipment, automotive parts, or workshop tools, trust LPS Shop Fast Degreaser for professional-level results that enhance efficiency, protect your investment, and simplify the cleaning process. Experience quicker turnarounds, safer workplaces, and pristine equipment condition every time—choose LPS Shop Fast Degreaser for fast, reliable, and hassle-free cleaning performance.

This industrial-strength solution is ideal for removing particulate soils from automotive and truck engines, tractors, forklifts, gears, chains and more. ASTM D4488-A3; Soil consists of a mixture (by weight) of vegetable oil, mineral oil, base oil, jet turbine oil, metallic brown oxides, napthenic hydrocarbon solvent. product_description: Things to Remember when Using Oil Eater Cleaners & Degreasers, Always use on a cool surface - Always spot test in an inconspicuous area on any surface before use. The less porous the surface is (i.e. no wax floors vs. uncoated concrete) the more diluted Oil Eater should be. If the surface feels a little slippery after rinsing, add more water to your solution.Please Note: A part is whatever your unit of measure is. For example: If you were measuring in ounces, 3 parts water to 1 part Oil Eater would be – 3 ounces of water to 1 ounce of Oil Eater.
